en-US.summary: This skill allows users to get the quote of the day by category.
examplePhrases: Alexa Open quote of the day
Alexa Start quote of the day
Alexa start quote of the day and tell me inspire quote
en-US.name: Quote of the day
en-US.description:
This skill allow users to get the quote of the day from famous personality every day, the user can hear motivational quote and then keep themselves motivated throughout the day. 

To get the quote of the day for a default category
Say "Alexa Open Quote of the day" Or "Alexa Ask Quote of the day"
Default Category is Inspire.

To get all supported categories
Just Say "Alexa Open Quote Of The Day and Get Categories".

To get the quote by the by a category
Just Say "Alexa Open Quote Of The Day and tell me a <CategoryName> quote. 

Supported Categories - Inspire, Management, Sports, Life, Funny, Love, Art and Students

Powered by quotes from https://theysaidso.com
